content: whether you re relaxing in the sun or taking a dip in the water this cover up will keep you comfortable and looking your best this easy-to-follow crochet pattern is made with a soft lightweight merino mix yarn that will not only keep you cool but also warm on those breezy days perfect for all body types and skill levels you ll whip this project up in no time free version of this pattern is available on my website https //www jerasjamboree co uk/beach-bloom-crochet-beach-cover-up-free-pattern/ /details skill level easy us terminology uk terminology /materials hayfield soft twist dk sunflower xs 863 yards s 1025 yards m 1125 yards l 1266 yards xl 1413 yards 2x 1568 yards 3x 1728 yards 4x 1896 yards 5x 2070 yards h/8 5mm crochet hook tape measure stitch marker x2 scissors yarn needle /size finished bust measurements cm xs 94 s 104 m 114 l 124 xl 134 2x 144 3x 154 4x 164 5x 174 finished length measurements cm xs 72 s 75 m 76 l 79 xl 82 2x 84 3x 85 4x 90 5x 91 /stitches and abbreviations used uk stitches double_crochet double_crochet treble_crochet treble_crochet double treble_crochet dtr us stitches single_crochet single_crochet double_crochet double_crochet treble_crochet treble_crochet chain chain st/s stitch/es skip skip repeat repeat space space chsp chain space ea each rem remaining instr instructions cont continuity rs right side slip_stitch slip_stitch copyright @ jera s jamboree 2022 no part of this document may be reproduced or transmitted in any form by any means electronic mechanical photocopying or otherwise without prior written permission from the author sales of finished product are permitted if you have any questions or comments please contact shaz-goodwin@jerasjamboree co uk
